basics.name: Ken Kato
basics.label: Entrepreneur, Architect, Digital Transformation Specialist, Thought Leader, Civic Technologist
basics.summary: From start ups to work within the public sector, my journey has been one of curiosity that always persisted and pressed me to the bleeding edge and back. Innovator, disruptor, entrepreneur; looking forward to my challenges of tomorrow and work towards a solution today

work.name: Login.gov
work.summary: As an experienced platform and enterprise architect, I am thrilled to accept the challenges that login.gov has to offer!

work.name: DON Black Pearl
work.summary: Founded the DevOps development platform Black Pearl, conceived and delivered within 75 days to the Dept of the Navy. The concept began when many programs across the defense department struggled to understand how to apply patterns like DevSecOps and it was done on a shoe string budget compared to typical spendeture for similar efforts not only in the Dept of the Navy, but across all federal agencies

work.name: Kessel Run
work.summary: Among the founding members of this amazing detachment within the USAF that brings DevSecOps and agile development to the AF to create software that our airmen love.

work.name: MITRE
work.summary: I came to Mitre in search of challenges that helps build a stronger nation and what I've found are individuals with similar goals all withing towards a common goal: to ensure our country's success across various industries from healthcare to defense.

work.name: Ken Kato Consulting
work.summary: Private consulting for various industries from healthcare to automotive that improved overall supply chain efficiency and delivery
